name: Trick-Crow, Blood Wing
effect:
2 Level 7 "Trick-Crow" Monsters
If you can pendulum summon level 7, you can pendulum summon this face-up card in your extra deck
While this card has Xyz materials, it cannot be destroyed by battle.
Once per turn, after this card battles a monster it did not destroy, detach one Xyz material from this card, banish that monster, and if you do, inflict battle damage to your opponent equal to half of that monster's original attack
If this card in the Monster Zone would be destroyed, you can instead place it in your pendulum zone
serial: This card cannot be used in a Duel.

pendulum.effect: Once per turn, increase the pendulum scale of your other pendulum card by 2 (max 8)
